participant_2.background:
I live a very active life, but I always make time for my family.
I love Halloween because it's a time to be creative and have fun.
I am a student who is trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
i like to write my own songs.
I'm insecure about my eating habits.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to be creative and make things. Halloween is my favorite holiday because I love to dress up and make decorations!
What do you like to do to make time for your family?
I try to stay active and healthy because I want to be around for my family. I love to hike and play sports with them.
I'm trying to quit smoking for the sake of my family. I'm also insecure about my eating habits.
I'm sure you can do it! My mom quit smoking and she's so much happier now. I love to cook and bake, but I'm always trying new recipes.
What do you like to do in your spare time?
I love to read and write music. I'm also a pet sitter and I love spending time with animals.
I love to read and hike. I also have to move across country for my job, but I'm excited to start this new chapter in my life.
That sounds exciting! I hope you have a great time in your new city.
